"She's Kitkat" said Blacknightmare "She's a Predacon and she was attacked a=
 time ago..."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2001 6:44 PM
  Subject: All =
of my Decepticons(and some other chars)


  ::Orchestra/Composer/Skullgrin/=
Triggerhappy/Cutthroat/
  Quatro/Bodicons::
   
       Orchestra walked aro=
und, and saw Blacknightmare.  He walked up to her.
   
       "I've recover=
ed from my wounds love.  Tell me, who was that?(Referring to KitKat)" Orche=
stra asked.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Composer w=
ent into the old Alliance base, and brought back an old, CR Chamber, and sa=
t it on the ground.
   
       "Yup, we're almost done," he said in reply t=
o Wheeljack.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Skullgrin=
 arrived back at the base after a while.  He saw the battle between Motorma=
ster and Megatron.  This was obviously a battle to decide who would be lead=
er.  Skullgrin transformed to robot mode.
   
       "MEGATRON!!!  Leader, =
it's you!!  Forget Motormaster, let's go Megatron!!!!  I've always been loy=
al to you!!" Skullgrin cheered.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~
         Triggerhappy arrived quickly in his jet mode.  He landed and tr=
ansformed to robot mode as well.  He didn;t say anything, his jaw dropped a=
s far as a transformer can drop their jaw.  Megatron!  What a great but als=
o scary sight!
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Cutthr=
oat arrived at the base.  He landed and transformed back to robot mode.
   =

         "Megatron and Motormaster here!  Me want fight!!!!!!" Cutthroat s=
neered.
   
          Cutthroat drew his weapon and fired a shot at Megatro=
n then at Motormaster.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      =
   Quatro kept going in hoverbike mode until he found the Maximal base.  He=
 stopped and transformed into robot mode.
   
         "Transformer Faction=
:Maximals
          Maximal Warship:Cybertronian Fire
          Status:Cras=
hed, Housing Maximals," Quatro said out some data he found on the Maximals =
and there base.
   
           Quatro searched for more information on the =
Maximals, their enemies in particular.
   
           *General Maximal Enem=
ies:Predacons,Decepticons* Quatro's results stated.  
   
           *Some =
Specific Enemies:Hell Beast,Megatron,Drill Bit, Killfest, Darkfate* 
   
  =
         Quatro looked up info on Megatron.
   
            *Megatron:Decep=
ticon Commander*
   
            Quatro was puzzled for 2 milliseconds, but=
 then looked back up on the deceased Megatron he had scanned out.
   
     =
       *Megatron:Predacon Commander*
   
            "Hmm," Quatro thought =
to himself,"I should be able to get just as good a reward for killing Megat=
ron of the Decepticons as if I killed Megatron of the Predacons.  Ha!  For =
now, I should side with these Maximals.  I may be able to collect more spec=
ific propaganda on my bounty."
   
             Quatro searched his endless=
 collection of data for the leader of these Maximals.
   
              *Fa=
ction Leader:Iron Raptor*
   
              Quatro opened a special communi=
cations link with Iron Raptor.(He doesn't need no special wrist device or a=
nything, he has a special device planted inside of him, so he can talk like=
 normal except over long distances and when he is engaged in a long distanc=
e conversation his eyes glow blue instead of green)
   
             "Iron =
Raptor, leader of the Maximals, I am universal bounty hunter Quatro, and I =
came to Earth to kill Hell Beast and Megatron.  I was thinking that I could=
 side with you for a while, and we may be able to help eachother," Quatro s=
aid.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Decapitron, Leg=
trap, Headshot, Gutclaw and Explobody arrived back at the base.  
   
     =
    "It's Megatron!  Fighting with Motormaster!  Don't get involved, just w=
atch," Decapitron said to his fellow Bodicons.
   
           

        Yah=
oo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject=
 to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
